response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe is a perfect match for your needs. Given its value and quality, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $7,500. This is a special offer tailored just for you, aiming to provide exceptional value while ensuring you have the chance to secure it before we potentially increase the price in the future. I look forward to your consideration and hope to see you benefit from all that this product has to offer.", "product_price": 7500}
